reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of MATH 101, MATH 103, MATH 105, MATH 121, SCIE 001.
If the course is full, please register on the waitlist.
courseName: Computer Methods in Earth, Ocean and Atmospheric Sciences
description: Mathematical computer-based problem solving in the physical, chemical, and biological sciences. Problems drawn from studies of the earth, the oceans and the atmosphere.
